script.name: plugin.expguild.comm
script.sourceplaintext:
$PAGE.ID = 947 $PLAYER.PAGE.ID = 3800 $player.name = get player name
$ret = null $settings = $a.obj -> get local variable: name='expguild' $hq = get player HQ
if $a.event == 'commcheck' if $a.value == [Comm.Dlg.ListOnboard] $start.group = get game start group id do if $start.group == 100 return [FALSE]
$owner = $a.obj -> get owner race do if $owner == Player return [FALSE] $kingdom.end = get sector from universe index: x=0, y=0 skip if $kingdom.end -> exists return [FALSE]
$sector = $a.obj -> get sector $jumps = get jumps from sector $sector to sector $kingdom.end do if $jumps < 0 return [FALSE]
gosub sub.BuildData skip if $settings return [FALSE] return [TRUE] end return [FALSE]
else if $a.event == 'text' $text = read text: page=$PLAYER.PAGE.ID id=10000 return $text
else if $a.event == 'question' $rewards.table = $settings['reward'] if not $a.value $ret = create new array, arguments=$PAGE.ID, 10000, null, null, null else if $a.value == 'exp.guild.info' $ret = create new array, arguments=$PAGE.ID, 10001, null, null, null else if $a.value == 'exp.guild.points' $ret = create new array, arguments=$PAGE.ID, 10002, null, null, null else if $a.value == 'exp.guild.claim' $ret = create new array, arguments=$PAGE.ID, 10005, null, null, null else if $a.value == 'exp.guild.special' $ret = create new array, arguments=$PAGE.ID, 10010, null, null, null else if $a.value == 'exp.guild.accept.gate' $cost = $a.obj -> get local variable: name='cost' $money = get player money if $cost > $money START speak text: page=[Page.MiscVoice] id=1254 priority=100 return [FALSE] else remove player money: $cost, transaction object=$a.obj, page=[Page.Menus], textid=1104763, null, null, null, null, null $ret = create new array, arguments=$PAGE.ID, 10007, null, null, null end else if $a.value == 'exp.guild.reject.gate' return [FALSE] else if $a.value == 'exp.guild.gate' $exp.data = get global variable: name='expguild.data' $hsap = $exp.data['last.hsap.unlock'] if $hsap -> exists $ret = create new array, arguments=$PAGE.ID, 10009, null, null, null else $toa.expire = $exp.data['toa.expire'] $playing.time = playing time if ! $toa.expire OR $toa.expire < $playing.time gosub sub.FindHSAP $table.hsap = $settings['hsap'] if size of table $table.hsap $ret = create new array, arguments=$PAGE.ID, 10006, null, null, null else $ret = create new array, arguments=$PAGE.ID, 10004, null, null, null end else $ret = create new array, arguments=$PAGE.ID, 10008, null, null, null end end
else if $rewards.table[$a.value]
$points = $rewards.table[$a.value] if $a.value == 'astro' OR $a.value == 'agent' $points = $points[1] end $points.avail = get available player discovery points if $points > $points.avail $ret = create new array, arguments=$PAGE.ID, 10003, null, null, null else return [TRUE] end else if is datatype[ $a.value ] == DATATYPE_SECTOR $a.obj ->set local variable: name='sector' value=$a.value $exp.data = get global variable: name='expguild.data' $cost.amt = $exp.data['player.hsap'] if $cost.amt == 1 $ret = create new array, arguments=$PAGE.ID, 10012, null, null, null $a.obj ->set local variable: name='cost' value=50000000 else if $cost.amt > 1 $a.obj ->set local variable: name='cost' value=100000000 $ret = create new array, arguments=$PAGE.ID, 10013, null, null, null else $ret = create new array, arguments=$PAGE.ID, 10011, null, null, null $a.obj ->set local variable: name='cost' value=1000000 end end return $ret
else if $a.event == 'answers' if not $a.value $ret = array alloc: size=3
$text = read text: page=$PLAYER.PAGE.ID id=10001 $ans = create comm menu answer: id='exp.guild.info' text=$text $ret[0] = $ans $text = read text: page=$PLAYER.PAGE.ID id=10002 $ans = create comm menu answer: id='exp.guild.points' text=$text $ret[1] = $ans $text = read text: page=$PLAYER.PAGE.ID id=10003 $ans = create comm menu answer: id='exp.guild.claim' text=$text $ret[2] = $ans
if $hq -> exists $text = read text: page=$PLAYER.PAGE.ID id=10004 $ans = create comm menu answer: id='exp.guild.gate' text=$text append $ans to array $ret end
if [PLAYERSHIP] -> get amount of ware Special Discovery in cargo bay $text = read text: page=$PLAYER.PAGE.ID id=10011 $ans = create comm menu answer: id='exp.guild.special' text=$text append $ans to array $ret end
return $ret
else if is datatype[ $a.value ] == DATATYPE_SECTOR $ret = array alloc: size=2 $text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104585 $ans = create comm menu answer: id='exp.guild.accept.gate' text=$text $ret[0] = $ans $text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104586 $ans = create comm menu answer: id='exp.guild.reject.gate' text=$text $ret[1] = $ans return $ret
else if $a.value == 'exp.guild.accept.gate' return [TRUE]
else if $a.value == 'exp.guild.special' do if [PLAYERSHIP] -> add -1 units of Special Discovery add player discovery points: 100000
else if $a.value == 'exp.guild.gate' $exp.data = get global variable: name='expguild.data' $hsap = $exp.data['last.hsap.unlock'] if not $hsap -> exists $toa.expire = $exp.data['toa.expire'] $playing.time = playing time if ! $toa.expire OR $toa.expire < $playing.time gosub sub.FindHSAP $table.hsap = $settings['hsap'] if size of table $table.hsap $sorted.gates = sort table keys by value: table=$table.hsap $gate.size = size of array $sorted.gates $gate.i = 0 while $gate.i < $gate.size $hsap = $sorted.gates[$gate.i] $gate.sector = $hsap -> get sector $text = $gate.sector -> get name $ans = create comm menu answer: id=$gate.sector text=$text $sorted.gates[$gate.i] = $ans inc $gate.i = end return $sorted.gates end end end
else if $a.value == 'exp.guild.claim' $rewards.table = $settings['reward']
$size = size of table $rewards.table $ret = array alloc: size=$size $i = 0
$reward = get next key: table=$rewards.table key=null while $reward $points = $rewards.table[$reward]
if $reward == 'astro' $yield = $points[0] $resource = $points[2] $points = $points[1] $text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=717 $asteroid.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=824 $text = sprintf: fmt='%s (%s %s %s)', $asteroid.text, $yield, $text, $resource, null else if $reward == 'agent' $name = $points[2] $tasks = $points[0] $points = $points[1] $text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104225 $text = sprintf: fmt='%s (%s)', $text, $name, null, null, null else if $reward == 'special' $text = read text: page=17 id=30213 $text = sprintf: fmt=$text, null, null, null, null, null else if is datatype[ $reward ] == DATATYPE_INT $text = convert number $reward to string $text = sprintf: pageid=$PLAYER.PAGE.ID textid=10010, $text, null, null, null, null else if $reward -> exists if $reward ->get discovery points $text = read text: page=$PLAYER.PAGE.ID id=10008 $text = sprintf: fmt=$text, null, null, null, null, null else $text = sprintf: fmt='%s', $reward, null, null, null, null end else if is datatype[ $reward ] == DATATYPE_WARE if is datatype[ $points ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $qty = $points[0] $points = $points[1] $text = convert number $qty to string $text = sprintf: fmt='%s x %s', $text, $reward, null, null, null else $text = sprintf: pageid=$PLAYER.PAGE.ID textid=10009, $reward, null, null, null, null end else $reward = get next key: table=$rewards.table key=$reward continue end $points.text = convert number $points to string $text = sprintf: fmt='%s [%s]', $text, $points.text, null, null, null $ans = create comm menu answer: id=$reward text=$text $ret[$i] = $ans inc $i = $reward = get next key: table=$rewards.table key=$reward end resize array $ret to $i return $ret end
else if $a.event == 'accepted' $rewards.table = $settings['reward'] $datatype = datatype[ $a.value ] if $a.value == 'exp.guild.accept.gate' $sector = $a.obj -> get local variable: name='sector' $table.hsap = $settings['hsap'] $hsap = get next key: table=$table.hsap key=null while $hsap $gate.sector = $table.hsap[$hsap] if $gate.sector == $sector $ware = Trans-Orbital Accelerator Construction Kit add blueprints to player HQ: type=$ware $hsap ->set owner race to Player $dest.gate = $hsap -> get gate destination: return sector=[FALSE] $dest.gate ->set owner race to Player $dest.sector = $hsap -> get gate destination: return sector=[TRUE] $exp.data = get global variable: name='expguild.data' $exp.data['toa.expire'] = $playing.time $exp.data['last.hsap.unlock'] = $hsap $exp.data['last.hsap.sector'] = $dest.sector $player.count = $exp.data['player.hsap'] if not $player.count if not $exp.data['npc.hsap.expire'] $playing.time = playing time $rnd = random value from 900 to 2400 - 1 $playing.time = $playing.time + $rnd $exp.data['npc.hsap.expire'] = $playing.time end $player.count = 0 end inc $player.count = $exp.data['player.hsap'] = $player.count $playing.time = playing time $playing.time = $playing.time + 21600 $exp.data['toa.expire'] = $playing.time break end $hsap = get next key: table=$table.hsap key=$hsap end gosub sub.ClearAndLock
else if $rewards.table[$a.value] $points = $rewards.table[$a.value] if $a.value == 'astro' OR $a.value == 'agent' $points = $points[1] else if is datatype[ $a.value ] == DATATYPE_WARE if is datatype[ $points ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $points = $points[1] end end $points.avail = get available player discovery points if $points <= $points.avail $reward = $a.value gosub sub.AcceptReward else START speak text: page=13 id=1381 priority=50 end end else if $a.event == [MEvent.Finished] $a.obj ->set local variable: name='sector' value=null $a.obj ->set local variable: name='cost' value=null end
return null
sub.BuildData: $time = playing time if $settings $expire = $settings['expire'] do if $time > $expire $settings = null end
if not $settings
$is.perm = [FALSE] $obj.sector = $a.obj -> get sector if $a.obj -> is of class Trading Dock $table.sectors = table alloc * Kingdom End $sec = get sector from universe index: x=1, y=1 $table.sectors[$sec] = $sec * Ocean of Fantasy $sec = get sector from universe index: x=19, y=4 $table.sectors[$sec] = $sec * Argon Prime $sec = get sector from universe index: x=2, y=3 $table.sectors[$sec] = $sec * Omicron Lyrea $sec = get sector from universe index: x=13, y=7 $table.sectors[$sec] = $sec * Seizewell $sec = get sector from universe index: x=5, y=2 $table.sectors[$sec] = $sec * Ianumus Zura $sec = get sector from universe index: x=9, y=9 $table.sectors[$sec] = $sec * Family Pride $sec = get sector from universe index: x=7, y=2 $table.sectors[$sec] = $sec * Family Njy $sec = get sector from universe index: x=17, y=6 $table.sectors[$sec] = $sec * Paranid Prime $sec = get sector from universe index: x=1, y=10 $table.sectors[$sec] = $sec * Cardinals Domain $sec = get sector from universe index: x=9, y=14 $table.sectors[$sec] = $sec * The Moon $sec = get sector from universe index: x=16, y=2 $table.sectors[$sec] = $sec * Loomanck $sec = get sector from universe index: x=9, y=11 $table.sectors[$sec] = $sec
if $table.sectors[$obj.sector] $is.perm = [TRUE] end * Pirate Anarchy Port else if $a.obj -> is of type Paranid Equipment Dock $sec = get sector from universe index: x=9, y=11 do if $sec == $obj.sector $is.perm = [TRUE] end
if not $is.perm $lock.time = $a.obj -> get local variable: name='expguild.lock' if $lock.time AND $time > $lock.time $a.obj ->set local variable: name='expguild.lock' value=null $lock.time = null end end
if not $lock.time $rnd = random value from 0 to 100 - 1 if $rnd > 30 AND ! $is.perm $lock.time = $time + 3600 $a.obj ->set local variable: name='expguild.lock' value=$lock.time else $settings = table alloc @ $rewards.table = [THIS] -> call script plugin.expguild.rewards : Amount=3 Ship=[PLAYERSHIP] $settings['reward'] = $rewards.table $expire = playing time $rnd = random value from 2000 to 4000 - 1 $expire = $time + $rnd $settings['expire'] = $expire $a.obj ->set local variable: name='expguild' value=$settings gosub sub.FindHSAP end end end endsub
sub.FindHSAP: $exp.data = get global variable: name='expguild.data' if $exp.data if $exp.data['player.hsap'] if $exp.data['player.built.toa'] if $exp.data['need.hsap'] $playing.time = playing time $playing.time = $playing.time + 60 $exp.data['npc.hsap.expire'] = $playing.time @ START [THIS] -> call script plugin.expguild.npcclaim : end end end end
$table.hsap = table alloc $sector = $a.obj -> get sector @ $sectors = [THIS] -> call script !lib.sectors.getconnected : Connected To=$sector Only Known=[TRUE] Sort by Name=[FALSE] $i = size of array $sectors while $i dec $i = $sector = $sectors[$i] $flags = [Find.Hyperspeed] | [Find.ExcludeGates] | [Find.ExcludeTerranGates] | [Find.Known] | [Find.Visible] | [Find.Multiple] $gates = find gate: flags=$flags, refobj=$sector, max dist=null, refpos=null if $gates $gate.i = size of array $gates while $gate.i dec $gate.i = $hsap = $gates[$gate.i] if $hsap ->is hyperspeed access point $hsap.sector = $hsap -> get sector if not $hsap ->is hyperspeed locked if not $hsap ->is hyperspeed destination hidden $gate.owner = $hsap -> get owner race if $gate.owner != Player $dest.sector = $hsap -> get gate destination: return sector=[TRUE] $dest.owner = $dest.sector -> get owner race if $dest.owner == Unknown OR $dest.owner == Neutral Race * if destination sector has a gate in it, we dont link $sec.gates = find gate: flags=null, refobj=$dest.sector, max dist=null, refpos=null skip if $sec.gates -> exists $table.hsap[$hsap] = $sector break end end end end end end end end $settings['hsap'] = $table.hsap endsub
sub.AcceptReward: $qty = null $points = $rewards.table[$reward] if $reward == 'astro' $yield = $points[0] $points = $points[1] $resource = $points[2] $sector = $a.obj -> get sector $x = random value from -40000 to 40000 - 1 $y = random value from -20000 to 20000 - 1 $z = random value from -40000 to 40000 - 1 $resource = get subtype of ware $resource $astro = create asteroid: type=1 addto=$sector resource=$resource yield=$yield x=$x y=$y z=$z $astro ->set known status to [TRUE] $astro ->set asteroid scanned to [TRUE] set player tracking aim to $astro -> else if $reward == 'agent' $hq = get player HQ if $hq -> exists $tasks = $points[0] $name = $points[2] $female = $points[4] $race = $points[3] $points = $points[1] $agent = $hq ->create agent: race=$race, female=[TRUE], tasks=$tasks $agent ->set name to $name START speak text: page=13 id=1388 priority=50 end else if is datatype[ $points ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $qty = $points[0] $points = $points[1] end = spend player discovery points: $points if is datatype[ $reward ] == DATATYPE_INT add player money: $reward, transaction object=$a.obj, page=[Page.Menus], textid=1104646, null, null, null, null, null START speak text: page=13 id=1339 priority=50 else if $reward == 'special' $exp.data = get global variable: name='expguild.data' $reward.sector = $exp.data['special.sector'] $special.hsap = $exp.data['special.hsap'] do if $special.hsap -> exists $special.hsap ->set hsap discoverable: [TRUE] $exp.data['special.bought'] = [TRUE] send script event: name='terran.plot', object=$a.obj, param1=null, param2=null if $reward.sector -> exists $text = sprintf: pageid=$PLAYER.PAGE.ID textid=10007, $player.name, $reward.sector, null, null, null end else if $reward -> exists $reward.sector = $reward -> get sector $text = sprintf: pageid=$PLAYER.PAGE.ID textid=10007, $player.name, $reward.sector, null, null, null send incoming message $text to player: type:[Log.Normal], display it=[FALSE], log it=[TRUE] else if is datatype[ $reward ] == DATATYPE_WARE if $qty $free = [PLAYERSHIP] -> get free amount of ware $reward in cargo bay $hq.free = 0 do if $hq -> exists $hq.free = $hq -> get free amount of ware $reward in cargo bay $can.transport = [PLAYERSHIP] -> can transport ware $reward if $free >= $qty AND $can.transport = [PLAYERSHIP] -> add $qty units of $reward $text = convert number $qty to string $text = sprintf: pageid=$PLAYER.PAGE.ID textid=10006, $player.name, $text, $reward, null, null send incoming message $text to player: type:[Log.Normal], display it=[FALSE], log it=[TRUE] else if $hq.free >= $qty $hq ->add product to factory or dock: $reward = $hq -> add $qty units of $reward $text = convert number $qty to string $text = sprintf: pageid=$PLAYER.PAGE.ID textid=10005, $player.name, $text, $reward, null, null send incoming message $text to player: type:[Log.Normal], display it=[FALSE], log it=[TRUE] end else if is equipment: ware=$reward set software available state: ware=$reward available=[TRUE] START speak text: page=13 id=1332 priority=50 else if $hq -> exists $hq ->add blueprints to player HQ: type=$reward START speak text: page=13 id=1332 priority=50 end end end end gosub sub.ClearAndLock endsub
sub.ClearAndLock: $a.obj ->set local variable: name='expguild' value=null $time = playing time $lock.time = $time + 1800 $a.obj ->set local variable: name='expguild.lock' value=$lock.time endsub return null

line.text: get sector from universe index: x=
sort table keys by value: table=
add blueprints to player HQ: type=
get sector from universe index: x=
get sector from universe index: x=
get sector from universe index: x=
get sector from universe index: x=
get sector from universe index: x=
get sector from universe index: x=
get sector from universe index: x=
get sector from universe index: x=
get sector from universe index: x=
get sector from universe index: x=
get sector from universe index: x=
get sector from universe index: x=
get sector from universe index: x=

comment.var: if destination sector has a gate in it, we dont link

line.text: add product to factory or dock:
add blueprints to player HQ: type=

sval.val: if destination sector has a gate in it, we dont link
